title: The country captaine and the Varietie, two comedies written by a person of honor ; lately presented by His Majesties servants at the Black-Fryars.
author: Newcastle, William Cavendish, Duke of, 1592-1676.
publisher: Printed for Hum. Robinson ... and Hum. Hoseley ...,
notes: Each play has separate paging and special title page: 1) The covntry captaine a comoedye ... Printed by Samuell Broun, 1649;  2) The varietie, a comoedy, ... London: Printed for Humphrey Moseley, 1649.
Pt. 1: Pages 25-51 have print show-through and are tightly bound with loss of text in filmed copy.  Pages 22-51 of Pt. 1 Photographed from British Library copy and inserted at end.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
